name: Lucky Lab
description:
Lucky Lab!

In this game, you are a little scientist going through his lab. You will find empty dices with little mathematical operations  along the way. They need to be filled with the correct answer in order to continue the way.

Controls

Move: Arrow keys.

Pick Up Dice: "A"

Roll Dices: "W"

Combine Dices: "O"  For this action, there has to be one number dice, next to one symbol(addition + substraction - or multiplication x) dice, next to another number dice.

Feedback is always appreciated! Feel free to leave a comments of anything you liked or didn't like.

Have fun!
